tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (JJ racist) (NN woman)) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (NN tram)))) (VP (VBD made) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN fool)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (PRP herself)) (, ,) (NP (WP what))))) (NP (NP (DT an) (JJ ignorant) (NN idiot)) (CC &) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB swear) (NP (NP (NN infront)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ little) (NN child)))) (PP (IN like) (NP (DT that) (NN smh)))))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [made/VBD nsubj>[woman/NN det>The/DT amod>racist/JJ nmod:on>[tram/NN case>on/IN det>the/DT]] iobj>[fool/NN det>a/DT nmod:of>[herself/PRP case>of/IN punct>,/, appos>what/WP]] dobj>[idiot/NN det>an/DT amod>ignorant/JJ cc>&/CC acl>[swear/VB mark>to/TO dobj>[infront/NN nmod:of>[child/NN case>of/IN nmod:poss>your/PRP$ amod>little/JJ]] nmod:like>[smh/NN case>like/IN det>that/DT]]] punct>!/.]
